name: datastream
doc:
Resources classes are used by rest.li to process corresponding http request.
 Note that rest.li will instantiate an object each time it processes a request.
 So do make it thread-safe when implementing the resources.

generated from: com.linkedin.datastream.server.dms.DatastreamResources

finders.name: findGroup
finders.doc: You can access this FINDER method via /resources/datastream?q=findDuplicates&datastreamName=name

actions.name: pauseSourcePartitions
actions.doc: Given datastream and a map representing < source, list of partitions to pause >, pauses the partitions.

parameters.name: sourcePartitions
parameters.doc:
StringMap of format <source, comma separated list of partitions or "*">. Example: <"FooTopic", "0,13,2">
                         or <"FooTopic","*">

actions.name: resumeSourcePartitions
actions.doc: Given a datastream and a map representing < source, list of partitions to resume >, resumes the partitions.

parameters.name: sourcePartitions
parameters.doc:
StringMap of format <source, comma separated list of partitions or "*">. Example: <"FooTopic", "0,13,2">
                         or <"FooTopic","*">
